abstract: A UHF station in Western Michigan — WMKG-LP, Channel 38 — that shows a mix of live talk shows and family and outdoor sports programming, is “priced to sell” at $550,000, according to its listing on eBay, The New York Times reports.
snippet: A UHF station in Western Michigan — WMKG-LP, Channel 38 — that shows a mix of live talk shows and family and outdoor sports programming, is “priced to sell” at $550,000, according to its listing on eBay, The New York Times reports.
lead_paragraph: You don’t need pockets as deep as Comcast’s to get into the TV business. Or even be a millionaire, apparently.

headline.main: This TV Station Could Be Yours for $550,000
